    '}];function Projects(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pfo__projects section__margin",id:"projects",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pfo__projects-heading",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"gradient__text-pink",children:"Recent Projects"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Short Description"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"pfo__projects-container",children:projectsData.map(function(item,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Project,{title:item.title,text:item.text},item.title+index);})})]});}export default Projects;
